item.title: 2.1 Network
item.description: State/Version: Draft 2.1 High level view 2.1 High level view Hardware, that belongs to the “Management” network, knows routes into the other networks and provide internet connectivity. Hardware grouped in IoT (Internet of Things/Trash) segment is considered as untrusted and therefore cannot connect to other network members. It still can be controled via internet.
